content.detailedDescription:
I dont know what this is a picture of.  my mom took the photos and sent them to me asking me if i knew.  she was taking pictures in the backyard of my nephew swimming and playing in the pool when it caught her eye.  it stayed perfectly still (appeared to at least)and then was just gone. if you know what it is please let me know, if its something of interest let me know and i will try to get more info on the time of day etc... it doesnt appear to be a solid object but the narrow line streaming from side to side is odd and it doesnt seem to fade as the clouds move.
thanks
content.summary: Odd object/light/something in the sky

content.detailedDescription: In the early morning hours of january 1st, 2011 my wife and i where driving(i was driving and she was in the passenger seat) home from a new years party at my step daughters house. we where heading south on 39th ave just south of bethany home rd when i noticed a ornage light in the east. it caught my attention because it was the brightes object in the sky. at first we thought it was an airplane but a i observed it i notice it didn't have and flashing red or green lights. when we got home the and down frome the car we notice that the orange light was moving slow at first towards south/west. as we watch it it seemed to speed up at times and than slow down. we obseved it for about 5 to 10 minutes as it moved towards the south/west. when it got almost to the south the light realy quickly got small and than went out. we keeped watching the sky to see if we could see it any more for 2 or 3 minutes but but no longer saw any thing. i don't know what it was but it was the second time i've seen that in the last 6 mounths.
content.summary: Orange light in east moving south/west

content.detailedDescription: After seeing the three flashing spheres dissapear..I noticed a flashing star or cross shaped object futher up in the atmosphere..It was there..For at least 30 min..I even told a guy at a nearby house to look up at the ufo..He said that he saw it too..And that it may be a satelitte..I thought no way..Do satellites flash?..My 1st thought about the three objects were ..Mylar balloons had escaped..And were floating away..But they were moving to fastand horizontally..Not floating up and away and then dissapeared after fumbing with my camera on my smartphone..I filmed the western sky..Knowing this 5 megapixel camera with no zoom would not even film a good video..But maybe someone would know how to zoom in later..Cant be the space station..It moves across the sky..Dont satellites to..I continued walking my dog and eventually i discovered there was no starshaped bright flashing object to be seen.
content.summary: While waliking my dog  i looked up to the western sky and saw three spheres..Flashing red and bright white..Moving south west..And dissapeared..

content.detailedDescription: While sitting at the dining room table we saw a bright fireball moving across the sky and we immediately went outside to see. the fireball moved from west to east much like an airplane, but definatly wasn't. the object appeared to be bright orange and on fire.
content.summary: Orange fireball moved from west to east north of trophy club, tx

content.detailedDescription: My mother first sighted them while outside taking care of the animals. she saw about nine orbs high in the southwestern sky, some of which were maneuvering in ways that seemed to defy conventional laws of physics. being an avid student of astronomy and all things sky-related, she ran inside to tell me what she saw, and i stepped out to see what she was talking about. by the time i looked, there were only two orbs left, as she said many of them had shot off in different directions and then disappeared. the orbs weren't falling or moving in any one particular direction, but almost seemed to "sway" in the sky before they slowly 'phased' out. admittedly, there were many fireworks going off for new years, although this was a good two hours before midnight. based upon the angular position of the objects in the sky as well as their bizarre movements, it was completely inconsistent with fireworks that i am familiar with. our neighbors, who were one of the families engaging in firework launching also made comments about the anomalous lights, remarking on never seeing anything like it before. my initial thought was to grab my 1200mm xt6 reflecting telescope to get a closer look, but within about a minute of coming out of the house, the orbs vanished in place. they looked like very bright red stars, slightly less radiant as sirius but more stable in terms of consistent brightness. there is no doubt in my mind that these were not astronomical objects of any kind, and the combination of 'some moving rapidly/some not moving at all' seems to rule out the possibility of these simply being fireworks or flares. after they phased out, i never witnessed any further activity that night. having studied the subject of unknown aerial phenomenon extensively, it should be noted that this phenomenon is identical to sightings reported in southern australia, tinley park illinois, and the uk.
content.summary: Roughly 9 red orbs, some maneuvering impossibly and others standing still

content.detailedDescription:
my brother and sister and i had climbed up on the roof on a fall evening in 1968 and we noticed four red, blue, green, and yellow lights in all four corners of the night sky.  my sister said it looked like they were over where the factories would be. my brother and i were kind of scared.  we went down and told our mother.  but like all adults she didn't believe us.  that was the only time saw them.  
now as an adult i always keep my eyes up.  you never know what you'll see.  i keep hoping someday to see them again.
content.summary: There were four lights at four points in the sky, over each car factory

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting by a fire in our back yard, i saw something out of the corner of my eye in our northern sky. it was an orange/redish color fireball floating quickly, then slowed up quite a bit, then hovered a minuite,moved southward again somewhat slow, hovered again and then dissapeared to the east/southeast. we watched it until it had moved out of sight. when we first saw it you could tell it wasn't anything we had ever seen before. it wasn't like a falling star, as it changed speeds several times. my first thought was it was a ufo. it was a very exciting feeling to watch this object, however afterwards i looked on the internet and saw where there had been sightings of the same exact thing(there was video) in other parts of the country and world. it started to make me feel a little spooked and weary.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object appeared to our north, moving somewhat fast,slowed alot, seemed to hover a min. ,stiill traveling south, hovered again and went east/south

content.detailedDescription: I had the dog out in my back yard around 10:30 pm.  i looked to the east and saw a strange looking orb like object heading west.  the top 2/3's of the object was red while the bottom 1/3 rd was orange in color.  it looked to be about half as high or a bit less than a passenger jet would fly and from my prospective, looked to be about the size of a basket ball.  the object covered roughly two miles in a minute or so and all of a sudden came to a complete stop in the sky.  it remained in this position for 30 to 45 seconds and then changed direction and headed north.  i watched for about another minute until it went behind the clouds and i could no longer see it.  there was no sound at all from the object as it was completely silent.  i'm 62 years old and this is the first unusual sighting i ever had!
content.summary: Ufo moved east to west, hovered then changed direction to the north

content.detailedDescription:
7:45am 01/01/2011 - lebanon, indiana

1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? 
standing at my back door smoking a cigarette with door open so the smoke goes outside.  

2. what made you first notice the object?  
its daylight, but its very cloudy morning, im looking s.S.E. when i notice an extremely bright solid white light in the sky. 

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
a planet, but 3 problems exist, its daytime, its very cloudy, and its bigger than what planet looks like in the night time sky.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions.
this light was not blinking, twinkling and did not have any colored warning lights. it was moving very very slowly towards the n.W. the object remained visible for 1 full minute then slowly faded away completely in 10 seconds.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

when i 1st seen it i thought "hmm, thats the biggest planet ive ever seen", my 2nd thought was, "can you see a planet during daylight and through heavy cloud cover?, my 3rd thought was i dont think you can. and if you can, could it be that damn big and bright? i never got any unusual feelings, just couldnt figure out what i was looking at. 

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
object dimmed, but its size stayed the same from its brightest to when it became no longer visible.
content.summary: Very bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on the roof of the hotel that i work in...The ball was droping in times square and i was on the roof to celebrate.. as soon as the new year happened i could hear the cheers from times  bc i work close by...Directly above times square three objects appeared then they made a triangle formation and flew away at great speed...Approximately 3 mins later about 10 lights appeared in the sky to my right then disappeared ...Approximately 1 min later approximately 20 objects zipped through the sky directly above me...This was a complete life altering event i'm sure other people witnessed this event...This was a very big showing please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Not glowing but light in color

content.detailedDescription: I walked out back to watch the random fireworks going off at mid nite on new years 2011. i was facing n/w at the time and noticed 5 faint lights coming toward me.I called to my sister to come and look at the planes flying in. but i soon realized that it was moving too slow to be planes it seemed to be hovering. it continued to head toward us as we stood in amazement watching it change from a v shape into an s shape it then seemed to stop as the lights slowly faded until only one faint light was visible. i immediately went inside to check the internet to see if anyone else saw it too. my internet was slow so i looked back outside and i watched 3 lights reappear in the same area that it had faded to. the 3 lights faded into one faint light. wow!!!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 5 lts. in line,then v shape,dissapeared.

content.detailedDescription: So i was riding passenger with my boyfriend on our way home from work. it was roughly 9:30 and i noticed a bright orange orb in the sky and having seen them before (most notably in '97) i was immediately taken aback. i watched the one orb for maybe a second or two and then saw two bright orange orbs come out of nowhere. they circled the original orb and then move to hover over it. forming an upside down triangle. i watched for another moment or two and the botton one faded away. the newest two ones stayed for a moment drifting back and forth and then slowly faded away about 2 or three minutes later. about 10 minutes later, i was watching the sky and saw five bright white lights blinking somewhat like a plane but very, very bright. they were spread pretty far apart blinking intermittantly.
content.summary: Orange fireball and white flash

content.detailedDescription: At the beginning of a friends party some of us witnessed three objects of a glowing orange color,the first two floated in close alinement with the third pulling up the rear. all three were silent moving about 80 miles per hr. the first two passed by going east to west,they kinda looked like those white chinese floating candles but you could tell they were some form of craft.The third slowed rose up and disapeared. all three objects were witnessed by 6 people in our group.
content.summary: Three objects flying east to west about 4 thousand ft.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling east on western row road approaching the intersection of western row road and snider road. my wife and i both seen the objects ahead of us in the sky. i guessed the objects were no farther away than a mile and no higher up than maybe 700 to 800 feet. we were able to guess the height by using the wlw radio tower across town as a reference. the objects appeared to be 3 dark objects roughly round in shape with a pulsing flickering orange/amber light at the top. the objects were moving in a triangular formation in a northerly direction with 2 objects in the lead and one trailing. the 2 lead objects were moving erratically forward and back in a horizontal manner while still maintaining a northward direction. at first we thought the objects were helicopters but realized they didn't have the telltale shape of an aircraft. i turned left/north onto snider road to try to keep the objects in sight but they gained elevation and were obscured by the clouds before they reached the wlw radio tower.
content.summary: 3 objects flying in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: Looked out my window, i noticed a very large white light, size of my hand or larger. it was low close to gound, moved up, and to my right. very bright light. i went to my front but could not see it.I knew that it was going to be in the area. i did not sleep to well the rest of the night. i was up at 4:00 not able to go back to sleep.
content.summary: Saw a large white object almost at gound level ,rise up,move to the right.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were returning from arizona to los angeles driving down the i-10 freeway. while i was driving i noticed an orange bright light in the sky and at first figured it was a plane coming in for a landing. as i drove down the freeway i noticed it was extremely bright, flying about as slow as a police helicopter usually does, and emitting an orange glow without any blinking lights like most aircraft. i woke my wife up to get her opinion on it as we were now coming up on it above us. at this point i had to look back at the road because it was flying over us. she watched as it flew over us and across the freeway back towards the east and noticed the shape being round with the back end being flat. the orange glow coming out of a hole in the center of the craft illuminated the bottom which she described as sort of white, but not white like a plane. almost an egg shell white. as the freeway bent we lost site of the object and weren't able to see it anymore. we had no feelings other than confusion at what we had seen.  
we see police helicopters on a nightly basis in la, and my wife grew up in tucson arizona where she would see many military craft flying in the skies daily and nightly. neither of us have any idea what this was. 


note: we did see this just before the ontario airport and are fully aware of that. when i first saw the bright glowing light i assumed it was flying into this airport, even though we were still a few miles away from it. along with knowing full well what a helicopter looks like at night, as low as it was flying we should have heard something, but we didn't.
content.summary: Saucer type ufo with a flast back and orange glow coming out the bottom

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my back porch to smoke a cigarette and noticed an object in the sky that resembled the size of your fist when fully extended from your body. it seemed to fly across the sky and downward out of sight. i hollered to my fiance who was in the bathroom that i had just saw something. i went inside for a few moments, and while i was inside she saw the exact same thing from a different room. i had not described to her what it looked like yet, and she told me it was like one diamond on top of a smaller diamond that seemed to fly across the sky and was glowing with a bright light that seemed to emanate from the top diamond with a blue aura around it, and the smaller diamond below was also emanating a dimmer light with a lighter blue aura (it happened to be the exact same description of what i had seen about 20 seconds prior.) the objects seemed to fall from the sky, down below the horizon. we went outside after she told me she had seen it too. there were no clouds in the sky prior to this, and then a wave of a cloud-like smoke came across the sky. she went inside for a few minutes, and i noticed the cloud-like smoke was moving incredibly fast across the sky. when she came back outside, i came in and she said the smoke was rising more, and then mysteriously vanished into thin air. i felt a sense of awe watching the events unfold, and she was scared to death. my brother did not witness the diamond-like objects, but he did witness the smoke. he was just as interested and in awe as i was. i'm still in a sense of awe as i post this, a mere 20 minutes after the sightings we have seen. i did not have a camera to take pictures with, and the objects moved by relatively quickly, lasting in the sky almost a few moments. the objects moved by too quickly to take a picture even if i had a camera. i've seen meteor showers and shooting stars, and i assure you that this experience was neither.
content.summary: Diamond shaped object one above other, two in a two minute period, cloudlike smoke that dissapated after a few minutes

content.detailedDescription: My daughter and her friend were on our roof watching the sky. they saw four orbs with multicolor flashing lights appear in the sky (west). they watched them for a few min and called my two sons in to watch. two orbs flew back and forth all over the sky, while the other two stood still.  one dimmed iits lights and flew low over a nearby field that is also near hwy 99 and then into the neighborhood and out of sight. this was about 8:45 pm. the kids drug me out of bed to see the ones still standing still in the sky. what i saw looked orb like or oval in shape, there were three of them, blinking about five different colors and made no sound. we live near mather afb and can also hear planes from sac international airport, these made no sound. they also could hover like helicopters but again no sound. i was able to watch with the kids for about 15 min they seemed to scattered away from each other and then one that was blinking multicolored lights began blinking only a blue and silver light. two flew away in opposite directions and one seemed to just disappear. i had the kids draw what they saw. the boys drawings look oval shaped, my daughter drew the one that flew close by and it was shaped like a flat rectangle. we did take pictures and video with our cell phones but they are horrible quality so i wont submit them unless someone really wants to see them. none of the kids were worried or afraid they all seemed to be excited. i felt apprehensive, it seemed like the more pictured we took the closer two of them came. i had the kids come in off the roof and we watched them from inside the house. we watched for them again tonight but they weren't there and didn't show up. the major things that make me think this was unusuall were they shapes of the crafts, the many blinking colored llights, and how they made no sound.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular,   Triangle
content.summary: Four orbs appeared and then scattered

content.detailedDescription:
Estaba prestando el servicio militar y estabamos en la base de la poblacion de santa rosa en la bota caucana. en mi turno de centinela que era de 12 a 3 am me recoste en el pasto y mire al cielo, estaba despejado y depronto una luz circular aparecio. se desplazo en linea recta, luego zigzagueo y rapidamente desaparecio.
durante el evento que duro de 10 a 12 segundo aproximadamente quede sorprendido y no pude dejar de ver esa luz la verdad me senti impactado porque siempre he creido en la existencia de los ovnis,
fue una sensacion maravillosa porque es importante saber que no estamos solos y me parece que es imposible que en este universo tan inmenso seamos la unica raza viva.
los felicito por su trabajo y mi hijo y yo creemos en la existencia de vida extraterrestre y en lo que les podamos ayudar aqui estaremos.


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
military service was and we were at the base of the population of  santa rosa in the boot cauca.  in my sentry shift was 12 to 3 am, i lay on the grass and watch the sky  was clear and depronto circular  light appeared. travels in straight lines, zigzags and then  quickly disappeared.
during the event which lasted from 10 to approximately 12 seconds was surprised and i could not help seeing that light the truth i felt shocked because i've always believed in the existence of ufos
was a wonderful feeling it is important to know that we are not alone and i think that it is impossible in this universe so big we are the only race alive.
i salute their work and my son and i believe in the existence of extraterrestrial life and what we are here we can help.
content.summary: Bola luminosa en zig - zag

content.detailedDescription: Around 11pm just south east of sacramento executive airport i observed an object just beyond sacramento executive airport. at first i thought it was a star and then it started to "crawl" across the sky and then stop and then it started to 'crawl' again in a more southerly direction. i thought it was an airplane coming in for a landing but the light became too piercing to be airplane landing lights. living near the airport, i'm extremely familiar with what airplane landing lights and configurations look like. i watched this object for 15 minutes to make sure it wasn't an airplane. after 15 minutes i grabbed my telescope and saw the object up close. the light was brilliant and piercing, the object was a sphere but looked like a diamond at the same time, it had an amber and orange shimmer to it. i stopped watching after around 45 minutes because i was scared. i called the airport but i have not received a response yet. please tell me someone else saw something of this sort on this same night because i really don't know what to think of what i saw, its something i have never seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange and amber sphere/diamond

content.detailedDescription: I was heading north on aurora (99) and noticed a light in front of a jet (white- perhaps alaska air). at that original distance the jet appearred about an inch long, the light maybe a sixteenth of an inch diameter (measured at arms length holding my fingers apart).The object brightly reflected sunlight from behind me for a moment then appearred a matte metallic color. it appearred to maintain a distance of 1 1/2 jet lengths in front until i found a spot to pull over to call my girlfriend to tell her. this occurred at10:02-10:04am. there was no northbound air traffic in the area for at least 5 min. after.The jet was just west of hywy 99 and first spotted just north of n 85th. at first i thought perhaps it was a fighter escort or a film crew jet (you never know) but the characteristics were way different from those. luckily i was on a 4 lane road with no other cars around so i could slow way down to safely look as long as i could. i also took off my sunglasses and put my head out the window to eliminate the possibility of it being a reflection. i lost sight of the object as the plane got further north and more distant and i had to pull over to be a safe driver as an intersection was ahead. i originally took notice of the jet because there was a distinct lack of air traffic at that time,just looked up and saw something odd out in front of it.
content.summary: Small orb flying 100-200 yards in front of jet northbound- clear skies, no other northbound air traffic at that time.

content.detailedDescription:
Never saw it until processing my photos

4421 crop at 200% first picture in a series
4422 crop at 200% second picture in a series
first image resized complete image of the second picture of ufo above the car in picture.

these were taken with a 5d mark ii & 24-105l lens at 28mm & 24mm at iso 200 & 1/1600s.  i was not taking pictures of a ufo.  i was only taking pictures of our snow around town.  i took 20+ other pictures that show there isn't any artifacts on my lens or truck window.  this also not lens flair caused by any light or sun hitting the truck windows or lens.  taken at the corner of locust street & washington avenue in st. peter, mn.  i am a wildlife & nature photographer by trade.

i have raw images available upon request.
content.summary: Never saw it until processing my photos

content.detailedDescription: Estaba llegando a mi casa y mire hacia el puente que esta cerca de mi casa y vi ese objeto suspendido sobre el , y estubo ahi por aproximadamente 10 segundos y se fue rapidamente hacia el sur . tenia una luz color blanca en cada punta formando un triangulo. cuando se fue lo hizo muy rapidamente y sin hacer ni un sonido. tengo un video en mi camara. se ve perfectamente .
content.summary: Objeto triangular con luz en cada vertice

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i went to a trip to penns cave, centre hall, pa to take a tour to see a cave and the wildlife tour.  while in the wildlife tour, we saw what looked like a rainbow so we took a picture. when i got home, i placed the chip in my printer and printed some pictures. one of the picture has an orange ball in front of the tall trees. at first i thought it was the sun.  but the sun could not be in front of the trees and so close.  there is an emission of colorful rays about 42 rays very beutiful. below the orange ball, there are some colors hot pink, aqua blue, light yellow.  i think those colors are what is emitting the rays.  i want to get the picture copyright before i mail or sent it by email to you.

in another incident, my boyfriend and his neighbor were jogging in our neighborhood and they say a light ball fly above them very fast and low in the sky. it was at 5:00 a.M. in the morning early december,2010.
content.summary: Picture of orange ball with colorful rays

content.detailedDescription:
Location: colusa, california
time of sighting: noticed an oddly colored star in the very center of the sky from my view, slightly to the west of the constellation orion; 8:38pm pst.  at 10pm, object was still in the sky.
i was outside looking at the stars, and as orion came into my view i thought what i witnessed was the international space station flying by.  as i watched the object, it moved north, south, and then to my amazement did a full circle in the sky.  it returned to its position to the west of orion.  the object was a slightly off color, amber-orange.  i went inside my house and got out a pair of binoculars to see if i could get a better understanding of what i just saw.  once i looked at the object through the binoculars it appeared to be in our atmosphere, too close to be a star.  and once more, startled me as it moved in the same pattern while i was looking at it through the binoculars.  i was under the impression it was trying to disguise itself as a star.  i felt the urgent need to report this to some one.  i used google and found your website.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An amber-orange object appeared to the west of the constellation orion.

content.detailedDescription: i was standing outside a residence on 300 west near 200 south in cedar city, utah.  i observed a orange glowing circle in the air.  it appeared to be a hundered or so feet above the height of a telephone pole.  i looked at it for a few seconds before pointing it out to several other people.  i was moving very slowly from the south to the north.  when it was above the group of people i was with it stopped above us for approximately 60 seconds.  it then slowly left to the north out of view. when i first noticed the object i thought it might be a road flare attached to a balloon.  after looking at it for a few more seconds i was sure due to the color and movement it could not be a flare.  i had a strange feeling of awe for the first 90 seconds the object was in view.  the feeling turned to curiosity until the object left.  i have never seen anything like the object before or since.  the entire group also saw the object.  i attempted to take a cell phone picture of the object but could not get my cell camera to work.  it was a cold night with little or no wind.
content.summary: Glowing orange ball

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home to loveland from fort collins. i was on collage ave. it is also hwy.287. was heading south on hwy 287. on the bottom of the hill is fossil creek pkwy. at this point i looked south-west and saw these bright orange lights,at first i said there no radio tower with lites on it there,and to high to be the lights of the tynans nissan that was up ahead on the right on the top of hill.Coming up the hill there were no other car going south so i slowed down and was about to pull over and i remembered w crestridge dr coming up on my right.I looked up through my sunroof and saw the lights above but just off to the westside of hwy 287. so i pulled on to this side road, and there was another truck watching these lights too.I jumped out and looked up and there were these 3 orange lights in the shape of a triangle above me slowly going  in a north direction one was out in front of the other 2.I got my cell phone out next to try to get a film it. at that point the lights changed shape.The one light to the far north stoped and at the same time the second light on the east side started to go west.The light on the far west was not moving.The light that was far north started to go back south with the light to east going west to meet it.Just before it looked like they would hit the north one was gone and the one that was right next to it got brighter almost redder in color.The one to the west started to move west to the foothills.The one flashed or got brighter above me again then it faded away.The one going west slowly lost sight of it over the foothills .I yelled too the others watching it( what was that!),they said nothing got back in there truck and left.At first was not sure what i saw ,it made no noise.My phone video showed nothing.Then i thought maybe it was a ufo.I was very interesting what ever it was wish i knew for sure what it was.There was a thin layer of clouds but i could see the stars through the clouds.
content.summary: Bright orange balls of light in the of a shape triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work on the sunday morning after christmas 12/26/2010 at 2:25 am and it was snowing lightly.I was traveling on matowomanbeantown road going from 301 south to rt 5. i was aprox half way down the road, where the park and ride is located at, when i saw a huge aircraft about 200ft in length emerg out of the clouds about 100 ft over the tree line. the first thing i noticed when i saw the craft coming out of the clouds was that it had an unusal amount of lights on the front of it to be and airplane. being that i am in the aerospace industry i see large aircraft on a daily basis and none of them have that many lights. nevertheless i was just thinking it was a large plane flying low. i continued driving slowly and watching it and shortly after it came out of the clouds, it banked a hard right maybe 60 degrees or more and at this point i could see the entire shape of the craft. it had lights covering the entire priemeter of the craft and what seemed like what would be the cockpit/fuselage it had lights surounding that part too. in the center of the craft where the fuselage would be at there was a red blinking light ontop of the craft and one on the bottom of it. this is what is called and anticollison light required by all aircraft flying in us airspace. i got excited at this point because i thought it was a b2 bomber and i have never seen one before. being that ive never seen one before i was not sure of the light pattern of the b2. it had the exact same shape a b2 has except the tail of the craft cut straight accross from wing tip to wing tip. the b2 has several triangle shapes on the tail of the aircaft. once the craft came out of its 60 degree bank and leveled off it just sat in one spot and did not move. at this point i pulled over because i was amazed that it stopped and hovered. i did not think this was a ufo, but was just some sort of aircraft that didnt exisit. so i pulled over and got out of the car expecting to hear a very loud enging running because the craft was hovering and it takes alot of power to hover an aircraft. i got out and i heard nothing but silence. thats when my heart started to beat really fast because i had an idea of what i was seeing. i went to grab my phone to take and picture and the lights just went out. i could still see the craft in the sky being that it was no more than 75 ft from me and it was snowing so it was easy to see. the craft was dark almost black and i could still easily see it hovering. i watched it for about 5 mins with its lights off just sitting there hovering. after the 5 mins it just started to slowly move out of sight and that was the last i saw of it. i did not hear any jet aircraft in the area which i thought was wierd because i was just outside of andrews airforce base and you cant get near that place with out setting off some sort of alarm. i know of 3 aircraft that can hover and two of those are stationed in the area i work and live. those being the osprey and joint strike fighter. both of these make alot of noise. this craft made absoultly no noise and just sat there and hovered. i havnt the slightested idea of what i saw that night. not sure it was man made or not of this earth. im leaning towards man made because of the anticollision lights located on it. but i know of no aircraft that is 200ft on length and can hover with out making any noise. i will truly never forget this expierence.
content.summary: B2 shaped aircraft covered with lights hovering in one spot

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were driving down highway 15-501 heading towards home when we first saw lights hovering over the road.  my first thought was that it looked like a new radio or phone tower with red, blue, and yellow lights, but i knew that wasn't possible because we travel down taht road often.  we first saw the lights about half a mile away and as we got closer we realized that the lights were hovering just over the tree line attached to a dark boomerang or triangle shape.  all of the lights seemed to be flashing at first, but as we got closer all the lights were shining down towards the road.  the object was not moving at all it was just hovering over the road.  when we passed under it we still could not figure out what it was, i wasn't driving so i turned around to look back and see it from the other side and i couldn't see it anymore.  we turned around about 100 yards past the object to try and get a picture of it but it was gone, no lights in the trees, in the sky, or anywhere else that i could find.  the object was not a helicopter because it made no sound, and not a plane because it was too low and did not move.  whatever the thing was it was about as wide as the highway and i could not tell how long it was because it was dark behind the lights.  this is the first time i've ever seen anything that i couldn't explain around here although i did see unexplained lights in the sky in iraq in 2003.  this area is only about 45 miles from ft. bragg/pope air force base, so i guess it could possibly be some kind of military project that i've never heard of.  i'm not one to jump to conclusions, but this thing has me confused.  i don't know if anyone else saw the object or made any kind of report.  i really just want to know if this fits with ufo sightings or if anyone can tell me what this may have been because it was only about 3 miles from my house.
content.summary: The object was floating over the highway just above the tree line with red, blue, and yellow lights on the bottom of a dark surface.

content.detailedDescription:
La primera vez que vi un ovni fue en marzo del 2008. no recuerdo exactamente la fecha, y la ���nica fuente que tenia para confirmar (mail contando la experiencia a otra persona) desapareci���..
fue en la ciudad de villahermosa, tabasco. m���xico. 
estaba viendo la tele con mi novio, cuando mi cu���ado nos llama para que salgamos a ver algo.. cuando voy al balc���n de la casa, logro visualizar como 4 luces rojas en el cielo, pero no se alcanzaba a distinguir ninguna forma, solo luces. se mov���an lento, para cualquier direcci���n sin ning���n problema.. empezaron a danzar o formar figuras entre ellos, y luego se fueron incorporando de a poco, dos objetos mas.. siguieron haciendo l���neas, rombos, tri���ngulos, y despu���s de 4 minutos aproximadamente, empezaron a desplazarse hacia un costado hasta desaparecer de mi vista. fueron pasando uno por uno, como por una misma ruta, as��� hasta perderse, siempre con una velocidad lenta, sin realizar movimientos bruscos. no se pod���a distinguir la distancia, pero daban la sensaci���n de que estaban mas lejos de lo que parec���a. yo en ese momento estaba acompa���ada de 6 personas, m���s otros vecinos de la cuadra que salieron a ver tambi���n al ser avisados. intentamos ver con un telescopio, sacar fotos, pero era in���til.. no se lograba visualizar nada desde esa distancia. 
en ese momento no pod���a creer lo que estaba viviendo, espere toda mi vida para verlos, y cuando llego ese momento, era muy dif���cil de creer.. hasta ahora lo recuerdo y es algo m���gico que pude presenciar. 
al d���a siguiente del suceso, averig������ si alguien m���s vio algo as���, y solo una persona confirmo haber visto entre 3 o 4 objetos, cerca del lugar. mire las noticias, y no encontr��� ninguna informaci���n relacionada. 
y eso fue todo. 
hasta ahora me pregunto: ���para que vienen? ���qu��� hacen o buscan?
content.summary: Avistamiento en mexico 2008
